name: The Hunter Of Lost Treasure
description:
Resume:

    The Hunter Of Lost Treasure is a single player adventure game, in which the only objective is for you to be cunning and intelligent enough to overcome obstacles to reach the end and get the Treasure.

Development team:

   This game was made in the first period of college by me individually, so the whole system of Game developer, UI/UX designer, Level Designer, 3D modeling, Programming manager, Interactions Programmer, was made by me.
